article.heading: Graph theory
article.paragraph: An(N,M,D,K,e)-disperseris abipartite graphwithNvertices on the left side, each with degreeD, andMvertices on the right side, such that everysubsetofKvertices on the left side is connected to more than (1 − e)Mvertices on the right.
AnExtractor (mathematics)extractoris a related type of graph that guarantees an even stronger property; every(N,M,D,K,e)-extractoris also an(N,M,D,K,e)-disperser.
article.heading: Other meanings
article.paragraph: A disperser is a high-speed mixing device used to disperse or dissolve pigments and other solids into a liquid.
